thread.title: Did man's belly cause Saints to miss field goal?

title: Did man's belly cause Saints to miss field goal?
text:

Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Did man's belly cause Saints to miss field goal? WWL 9:49 p.m. EDT October 5, 2015 at Mercedes-Benz Superdome on October 4, 2015 in New Orleans, Louisiana. (Photo: Chris Graythen) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Just when Saints fans think they've seen it all - and have show it all to fans around the country, the image of a shirtless man showing off an ample belly while seemingly trying to coax a potential game-winning field goal through the uprights, has gone viral. 
The vine of the unnamed fan, who is holding his shirt up to reveal his stomach - and more - is making the rounds, with the SB Nation site blaming the miss on the fan. 
However, the powers-that-be obviously didn't stay upset with the Saints, as they scored to win in overtime just a short time later. 
The question is, in this day and age, how long before that fan is talking to someone on TV? 
New Orleans beat Dallas, 26-20, in overtime.
